contentList.content: The circus is in town! Whether it be making fun of the powers that be, laughing at a buffoon in an awkward situation, or being glad that someone out there is more embarrassing than you, you wield the spice of life that is comedy to great effect. Adorn your make-up and prepare for the show; your adoring crowd awaits.

You are the ringmaster of your troop, proud of the gags and pranks you inflict upon the deserving. Sometimes your jokes are at the expense of your comrads, but no price is too big to pay for the sake of the punchline. Your magical capabilities are a sight to behold; you wield the weave as well as you wield humor.

The bumbling fool; you trip into every circumstance available to you. Often one of the recipients of the White Face's off-putting jokes, you are the lovable boob that spreads mischief across the land. Your physical prowess as a stunt man is only second to your satirical whimsy.

Your fall from grace is considered legendary by many. Replacing your highfalutin swagger with clown paint, you search for comfort within nihilism, and seek to drag those around you into your depression. Your pain is a boon to many, uplifting them as only the butt of a joke could.

"Go to clown school they said. It would be fun they said. No one ever said you'd be scraping brains off a starry mallet Dave! No one ever said you'd be mocking people until they died Dave!" - Chortles the Clown
Honk Honk! You are immune to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HIDEOUS_LAUGHTER">Hideous Laughter.</LSTag>
A secret source to a gaggle of gags in your arsenal.
Everyone loves pie! Especially a pie that flies!
Who doesn't like a good pastry to the noggin'? Apparently everybody. Inflicts <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MADNESS">madness</LSTag> to those hit by your jovial and enthusiastic use of camp supplies.

Your troop is a gaggle of goofballs; crack a joke on them to inflict <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CLOWNTIME_HECKLED">Disadvantage</LSTag> on their next Attack Roll, and give Advantage to your next Attack Roll. Lasts one turn.
You've been made fun of by a clown. You have Disadvantage on your Attack Roll.
Your antics against your troop has filled you with childish glee! You have Advantage on your Attack Roll.
Your opinion of yourself borderlines on arrogance; after all, you're the kingpin clown. Such beliefs fuel your strikes with extra zeal; deal Force Damage equal to your Charisma modifier per attack.

Against your better judgement, you have swallowed a con man's potion from a competitor's circus. On the label it reads: "It's a miracle that you found this super duper ultra special extra secret brew by Faerun's finest alchemists! It grows hair back; it makes you more handsome; it can even bring dead plants back to life!" Small font adorned the bottom of the bottle, warning of psionic side effects. Deal Psychic Damage equal to your Charisma modifier per attack.

Your vast experiences make you more likely to succeed in any undertaking. Add half of your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> (rounded down) to <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> that you are not <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> in.
Your jokes cut deep; most people are having trouble telling you're joking. <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_ViciousMockery">Vicious Mockery</LSTag> is now boosted by your Charisma Modifier.

The rush of killing for the fun of it overwhelms your brittle senses. Enter a state of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MANIACAL_FRENZY">Mania</LSTag> that increases your damage after killing an enemy. The damage of this passive increases with your clown level.
You are the killer clown, hunting for humor in the death of your enemies. Driven to insanity by your laughter, your damage is increased.
Come one, come all! See if you can ring the bell with your bolstering muscles! First one to knock the enemy into the sky wins a prize!
Create a distracting illusion with a hidden surprise!
Create an illusion and have some fun; tick, tick, tick, KABOOM!
Even those without a fear of clowns know to be terrified of you.

Your frightening aura gives the affected entity apparitions, <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on attack rolls, and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> while within [1] of the spellcaster.
Neutralize a target's aggression, making them easier to catch.
Make them very happy with this fun toy.
Create some fun party favors to liven things up.
Concoct a bottle of Happy Time.
Concoct a bottle of Bibberbang Juice.
Concoct a bottle of Afterpiece Tonic.
Concoct a bottle of Haste Fumes.
Summon a circus of clowns to surround and harrass your enemies.
Summon a circus of clowns to surround and harrass your enemies.
<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WET">Soak</LSTag> creatures with your gag-flower.
While having a shockingly good time, the target cannot use reactions. This spell has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on creatures with metal armour.
You believe you can see the future, and you wield this belief against others. Your Weapon Damage now scales with your Charisma Modifier.

Years of watching this act be carried out by your carnie compatriots has vicariously impacted your body. You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Athletics, and your melee attacks are boosted by your Strength Modifier.
Despite being the bumbling nincompoop you are, your ability on the wire is not to be questioned. You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> and Acrobatics and Performance checks.
People are still in awe of your ability to swallow flame tipped torches to this day. You are resistant to Fire Damage.

Your time at clown college netted you some dextrous abilities with juggling balls. Your Throw Damage now is increased by your Charisma Modifier, and you gain an additional Roll Bonus towards Sleight of Hand.

Fearless in the face of heights, your ability to fall with grace is applauded by many a fan. You suffer Half Damage from falls, and are immune to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SUFFOCATING">Suffocation</LSTag>.
Having been fired out of a cannon many times in your lifetime, you're built of stronger stuff. Your Hit Points are further increased by 1 per level earned.
Tools of the Trade: Heavy Drop
How you dropped a piano on your foe's head, nobody knows.
Ironically, they won't feel safe when this hits them.
Hold still; this one is exceptionally heavy!

It looks like your friend isn't having much fun judging by their injuries. Cheer them up by inflicting <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MONSTROUS_LAUGHTER">Monstrous Laughter.</LSTag> Like they always say, laughter is contagious!

Your voice cracks with a magical cackle that is infectious to the ear. All those within range of your hysteria must succeed a Wisdom saving throw or be subjected to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HIDEOUS_LAUGHTER">Hideous Laughter.</LSTag>
Welcome to the Show: Razzle Dazzle
You herald in the crowd with a dazzling display of fireworks. Inflicts <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="COLOR_SPRAY">Color Spray</LSTag> on those swept up in the explosion.
Welcome to the Show: Hollering Hootenanny

Thank you for coming to the show! Please exit the carnival in a timely fashion, or be blown to smithereens. Inflicts <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="COLOR_SPRAY">Color Spray</LSTag> on those swept up in the explosion.

Give em' what for! Attack with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>; foes have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> against you as well. Requires <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MANIACAL_FRENZY">Giggle Fit</LSTag> to be active.

You channel the maestro of clown-kind in your wallops. Inflict <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HIDEOUS_LAUGHTER">Hideous Laughter</LSTag> if you critically strike a foe with <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_TestYourMight">Test Your Might!</LSTag>

Sometimes you just have to sit down and nap in the middle of a bloodied battlefield as the fight is still going on. You regenerate Hit Points while <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SLEEPING">asleep.</LSTag>. The heal increases with your Clown level. You cannot be harmed while in this state.
The stress of the moment has rendered you too exhausted to continue. You are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SLEEPING">sleeping to recover.</LSTag> You cannot be harmed while sleeping.
The jokes that hurt the most are the ones you crack on yourself. Inflict damage upon yourself and those around you. Damage to enemies and yourself increases with your Clown level.
All this joking around has you feeling tired. You go to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SLEEPING">sleep to recover.</LSTag> You cannot be harmed while sleeping.
